thread.title: International First and Business Class Tickets Leader, Alpha Flight Guru Announces Coverage in JetSet Magazine Online Edition
thread.title_full: International First and Business Class Tickets Leader, Alpha Flight Guru Announces Coverage in JetSet Magazine Online Edition - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: International First and Business Class Tickets Leader, Alpha Flight Guru Announces Coverage in JetSet Magazine Online Edition
text:
Alpha Flight Guru provides innovative discount first and business class tickets to destinations worldwide. The company has been featured in Jetset Magazine's Online Edition.
(PRWEB) October 16, 2015
Alpha Flight Guru, the leader in discount first and discount business class at http://alphaflightguru.com/ , is proud to announce that it has received coverage in the prestigious Jetset Magazine, online edition. Jetset Magazine is an online and print media publication that covers the lifestyle tastes of wealthy individuals and aspirants.
"Alpha Flight Guru is premised on delivering high quality first class and business class tickets with all the luxury travel amenities but at affordable, discount prices," explained Alex Scoble, Chief Marketing Officer of Alpha Flight Guru. "Coverage in Jetset magazine's online edition is proof-positive that we are not only bringing back the joy of luxury travel but also doing so at affordable price points.‚Äù
To read the online coverage, in full, please visit https://www.jetsetmag.com/sections/aviation/alpha-flight-guru-modernizing-the-full-service-travel-agency-in-a-digital-age . To begin a search on Alpha Flight Guru for discount first class or business class tickets, please visit http://alphaflightguru.com/ .
Highlights of Jetset Magazine Coverage
With a focus on high-end lifestyles, Jetset magazine begins its coverage of Alpha Flight Guru with a harkening back to the so-called "golden age" of flying with perks such as champagne, inflight meals, and flight attendants sporting crisp uniforms and white gloves. The article goes on to explain that the Internet spawned a first wave of ferocious cost-cutting by both airlines and online travel agents. Finally, Alpha Flight Guru represents a new wave, combining both the luxuries of first class or business class tickets with discounted luxury travel prices.
About Alpha Flight Guru
Alpha Flight Guru is a full-service, luxury travel agency that brings personalized guru service to the search for cheap business class tickets and cheap first class tickets to destinations from Europe to Asia to Australia and beyond. The company's expert gurus find unpublished discount fares, both business class and 1st class tickets, to cities like London or Paris, New York or Los Angeles, Melbourne or Sydney. Customers simply use the company's website to enter a destination, and then let a guru find discounted, cheap, unpublished business class or first class airfares to London, Paris, Sydney and beyond.
Web. http://alphaflightguru.com
Tel. 800-359-5175
 //www.prweb.com/releases/businessclass/tickets/prweb13024131.htm
